not_found.description: The page you are looking for does not exist.

invitations.title: User Management
invitations.page_description: Send an email invitation to add a new member to your team. The user will receive a secure link to create their account.

email.label: Email address
email.description: The user will receive an invitation link by email

role.label: Role
role.description: Defines the user's permissions in the organization
role.no_roles: No roles available for this organization
role.default_roles: Default roles (Admin, Manager, Partner, Viewer, Hostess) available for the new organization

organization.label: Organization
organization.description: Organization to invite the user to
organization.hint: Select an organization first to see available roles
organization.auto_info_slug: The slug will be generated automatically (e.g.: acme-corporation)
organization.auto_info_roles: Default roles will be created automatically
organization.auto_info_timezone: The timezone will be set to Europe/Paris
organization.auto_info_assignment: The user will be automatically assigned to this organization

events.label: Associated events
events.description: Events for which this role applies

message.label: Custom message (optional)
message.placeholder: Add a personal message to the invitation...
message.description: This message will be included in the invitation email

ORG_ADMIN.name: Organization Administrator
ORG_ADMIN.description: Full access to the organization, user and event management

ORG_MANAGER.name: Organization Manager
ORG_MANAGER.description: Management of organization events and attendees

EVENT_MANAGER.name: Event Manager
EVENT_MANAGER.description: Full management of specific assigned events

messages.emailExists: A user with this email already exists
messages.resent_detail: A new invitation has been sent to {{email}}.

validation.required_fields_message: Please fill in all required fields before sending the invitation.
validation.org_name_required_message: Please enter the name of the new organization.
validation.org_required_message: Please select an organization or create a new one.

errors.org_exists_message: An organization with the name "{{name}}" already exists. Please choose a different name or select the existing organization.
errors.already_pending_message:
An invitation has already been sent to {{email}} on {{date}}.

It expires on {{expiresDate}}.

Would you like to resend a new invitation?
errors.already_pending_simple:
An invitation has already been sent to {{email}}.

Would you like to resend a new invitation?
errors.account_exists_message:
An account with the email {{email}} already exists in the system.

Currently, each user can only have one account. If this person needs access to multiple organizations, please:
• Ask them to use a different email to create a second account
• Or wait for the upcoming update that will allow a user to join multiple organizations
errors.invalid_email_message: The email address provided is not valid. Please check the format.
errors.access_denied_message: You do not have the necessary permissions to send this invitation.

how_it_works.title: How it works
how_it_works.description: The invitation process in 3 simple steps
how_it_works.step1_description: An invitation email is automatically sent to the specified address
how_it_works.step2_description: The user receives a secure link to complete their registration
how_it_works.step3_description: They can create their password and immediately access the platform

important.title: Important points
important.check_email: Verify the email address before sending the invitation
important.expires: The invitation link automatically expires after 48 hours
important.can_resend: You can resend an invitation if needed
important.permissions: The user will receive permissions based on the assigned role

invitations.access_denied_message: You do not have the necessary permissions to manage invitations.

organizations.title: Organizations
organizations.description_super_admin: Manage all organizations and their users. Click on an organization to show/hide its users.
organizations.description_admin: Information about your organization and your team
organizations.access_denied_message: You do not have the necessary permissions to view organization information.
organizations.create_error_default: An error occurred while creating the organization.
